item.title: US to suspend visa processing for 75 countries starting next week

item.title: Vance, Rubio meet Danish officials amid Trump's threats to 'acquire' Greenland
item.description: A high-stakes meeting happened Wednesday at the White House between top U.S. and Danish officials about Greenland's fate.

item.title: WATCH: Is your dog eavesdropping on you?
item.description: New research suggests man's best friend is also listening in on conversations in an effort to learn from you.
